name: Link QC to gate entry
script:
gate_entry = doc.gate_entry_no
qc = doc.name

# qc_list = frappe.db.get_list('Purchase Receipt Item',filters={'parent': f'{name}'}, fields=['quality_inspection'])
parent = frappe.get_doc('Gate Entry', gate_entry)
parent.append("qc_details", {
            'qc': qc
        })
parent.save()
frappe.db.commit

name: tax
script:
a = frappe.form_dict["no"]

result = frappe.db.sql("""
    SELECT tr.tax_rate
    FROM `tabItem Tax Template` it
    JOIN `tabItem Tax Template Detail` tr ON tr.parent = it.name
    WHERE it.name = %s
""", a)

# Extract the tax rates from the result set
tax_rates = [row[0] for row in result]

# Compute the sum of tax rates
total = sum(tax_rates)
total_2 = str(total)
frappe.msgprint(total_2)
frappe.response["total"]=total_2
